product_name: Drunk ElephantLala Retro Whipped Cream Moisturizer with Ceramides
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's Lala Retro Whipped Cream Moisturizer with Ceramides is an airy, whipped rescue cream, infused with a triple-ceramide blend and five African oils, that provides daily moisture maintenance at any age.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps skin retain long-lasting moisture.Provides replenishing barrier support by reinforcing skin's acid mantleReinforces skin's acid mantle and defends against every day stressorsCombats visible signs of agingDermatologist TestedFormulated without the Suspicious 6 - Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcoholsFormulated at a skin-friendly pH of 5.22024 Allure Reader's Choice Award Winner: Best Facial MoisturizerKey IngredientsAfrican-Oil Blend: Nourishes, visibly rejuvenates, and moisturizes.Ceramides AP, EOP, and NP: These plant-derived ceramides are identical to the wax-like moisturizing ceramides that occur naturally in skin. In Lala Retro, they help soothe/maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss.Phytosphingosine: This plant-derived lipid has powerful soothing and restorative benefits.Research ResultsIn a consumer-perception study with 30 people after 8 weeks:93% agreed skin felt softer93% agreed skin felt smootherItem 2588438How To UseApply one pump morning and night to a clean, dry face. Mix with any Drunk Elephant serum or oil as part of a total skincare solution.TIP: Add a shot of B-Hydra (sold separately) for an additional shot of vitamin B hydration.Skincare Smoothie Tip: Try a Drunk Elephant "Saving Face Smoothie" - 1 pump of Lala Retro + 1 pump of TLC Framboos for smoother, more radiant skin.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopropyl Isostearate, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Plantago Lanceolata Leaf Extract, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, Cholesterol, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Ceramide NP, Phytosphingosine, Ceteareth-20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tocopherol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Carbonate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply one pump morning and night to a clean, dry face. Mix with any Drunk Elephant serum or oil as part of a total skincare solution.TIP: Add a shot of B-Hydra (sold separately) for an additional shot of vitamin B hydration.Skincare Smoothie Tip: Try a Drunk Elephant "Saving Face Smoothie" - 1 pump of Lala Retro + 1 pump of TLC Framboos for smoother, more radiant skin.
ingredients: Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate

reviews.headline: I have no clue, have not received it.
reviews.comments: I haven't even received this item yet! Im truly upset about this

reviews.headline: Comogenic
reviews.comments:
Caused my skin to breakout in small cluster Acne.
My skin was completely clear until I used this. Now I have acne all over the side of my face.

reviews.headline: made me break out:(
reviews.comments: Received this as a sample. I used it for about a week and starting breaking out. I love the way it made my skin feel but I dont recommend this product if you are prone to breaking out easy.

reviews.headline: Acne/pimples!
reviews.comments: Not for oily skin! It was a gift and I broke out, and unfortunately I break out in huge acne. I had 5 big pimples right away. I gave it to my mother in law. I'm still waiting for my pimples to clear up. It's been over a week or two. Unfortunately I cannot exchange the gift.

reviews.headline: Recommended by Ulta employee
reviews.comments: I am going to return this product. It doesnt absorb well enough nor does it hydrate my dry skin. It actually causes me to have more flakes than normal.

reviews.headline: okay
reviews.comments: This is the second time I received a sample of face cream from this brand and yet again I didn't learn my lesson. breaking out in white heads and red and painful.

reviews.headline: Love this Moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer. Very nourishing and helps with dryness. That's what I've been looking for. The fragrance is nice, and not overpowering, I can't believe someone would complain about the fragrance! Great product! I received it as a free sample.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer for daywear
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is light and perfect under makeup

reviews.headline: Just alright
reviews.comments: Thought it would be a little more fun and luxurious, just kind of smells and feels like a grandma cream. How i would expect likeâ€¦an olay cream to feel

reviews.headline: Not worth it, but could be worse
reviews.comments: I love the texture of this product.  It feels airy and smooth and absorbs well.  I don't like the way it smells.  I can't place what it smells like, but I had a Protini serum and that smelled the same way.  I know this brand doesn't add fragrances, but my nose is sensitive to something they use.

reviews.headline: Awesome Product!
reviews.comments: Makes skin feel super smooth.  Love it

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: Absolutely love it! Feels great on, my, skin, light, hydrating and my skin feels so soft! Hate the price tag but definitely recommend it.

reviews.headline: Only for normal skin, doesn't last at all
reviews.comments: I received this as a sample w/ my purchase. It seems creamy & looks as though it would be hydrating. However, it only lasted maybe a few hours before I needed to reapply. I ended up applying 3x a day in order to keep my skin from feeling dried out. I have dry skin, so this seems like it may only work for normal skin. I live in Cali, & this heat is drying, so this creme doesn't not hold up. I would not recommend. Def not worth the price tag. I recommend Cosrx for Dry & sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Just an okay moisturizer, nothing special, way overpriced.
reviews.comments:
I got this as a sample as part of my order. I used it a few times and it's just okay. It feels nice on the skin - smooth, no fragrance. 

But I've been into skincare for over a decade now and in my opinion there are WAY better products out there for your money. The entire Drunk Elephant brand is so overpriced, over marketed, and unimpressive.

reviews.headline: best ever!
reviews.comments: I was really surprised at how much I love this moisturizer! I received a small sample as a gift with a previous order and tried it out right away. I've become obsessed and bought the full size the next day! The price scared me a little bit, but to me it's absolutely worth it. I love the texture, it's thick but not greasy. It goes on my skin matte, not shiny. It keeps my dry skin perfectly hydrated all day! I'm usually having to apply multiple times a day because my skin is so dry. I love the smell as well. I think it's technically unscented, but it smells like crayons to me, which I love.

reviews.headline: Rash
reviews.comments: This product made me break our in a huge rash. Do not buy for children I am 18 and it gave me hives and a rash

reviews.headline: Not For Me
reviews.comments: I don't even know what made me try this. It was a gift  with purchase and given all the hype around this brand, I was expecting more. Definitely wasn't expecting for it to break out my face. I also didn't like how it spread across my face. It feels cheap. A very small amount was used because I did not like the consistency and it still broke my skin out. I wouldn't try any other product from this brand.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Opened the package an low and behold it was already used with reminents of past product! Literally disgusting.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: This is the only moisturizer that has been soothing for me, during these hot and humid days.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing

media.headline: So whipped and hydrating for dry skin!
Moisturizes, soothes and is suitable for all skin types.

No irritation, no breakouts! just happy, healthy skin

media.caption: This is a no no honey.

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought it three weeks ago and has already made a huge change to my skin. Definitely recommend.
faceoff_positive.headline: Very moisturizing

faceoff_negative.comments: This product is fairly okay, but only if you need a thick heavy cream for your skin. I have sensitive skin and this seems to be kind of irritating as it is such a heavy cream. This product does last for a fairly long amount of time and is very popular among people. I would get if if I just needed a heavy cream as this does not target any skin concerns for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Its ok, but way over priced

rollup.name: Lala Retro Whipped Cream Moisturizer with Ceramides
